message: Don't miss the HCC Show 2016 Anthropology to be held in our cafetorium on April 13, 2016 at 7pm. Tickets are $12 each and are available by contacting the school. Hope to see you there!
Don't miss the Tour Band Concert tonight. 7pm in the main hall. The concert is free of charge. Come along and see what the students will be performing whilst abroad.

It seems we are off to a fast start with the winter weather this year! Please be sure that we have up-to-date information for your household.  Log onto the Infinite Campus Parent Portal and click on Household Information on the left side of the screen.  If you don’t yet have a Parent Portal Account, please contact your student’s school office.
